verbs.description: The only thing worse than the [V: nauseating] [ARG0: cruelty] of President Trump ’s immigration policy — captured perfectly by the agonizing stories of young children forcefully being separated from their parents at the border — is the craven dishonesty with which he attempts to sell it to the American people . In January , Trump told a bipartisan group of House and Senate leaders that he ’d sign any policy they put together ...
